name: Shuffle Scuffle (SirHorse)
description:
Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Reset/Continue

Shuffle Scuffle is a puzzle game all about arranging boxes so that they match with their finishing points, but the twist is, you control all boxes at once, which is how it relates to the theme

To complete the games puzzles you must take advantage of the level itself, pushing the boxes against the walls so you can align them properly.
